abstract: Iron ore producer Magnetation announces possible layoffs and production decline at plant in Bovey, Minn; Cliffs Natural Resources is shutting down plant.
lead_paragraph: Magnetation, an iron ore producer, announced possible layoffs and a decline in production next year at a plant in Bovey, Minn.

headline.main: Minnesota’s Iron Ore Producers Retrench, Troubling a Region
headline.print_headline: Minnesota’s Iron Ore Producers Retrench, Troubling a Region

snippet: Magnetation, an iron ore producer, announced possible layoffs and a decline in production next year at a plant in Bovey, Minn.
